item.title: Sensex and Nifty Slip Amid Mixed Sector Performance; Small Caps Show Resilience
item.description: The Indian equity markets closed the day with modest declines as the Sensex and Nifty edged lower, reflecting a cautious investor sentiment amid mixed sectoral trends and subdued breadth. While large caps faced pressure, small caps demonstrated relative strength, supported by select sectoral gains and global cues. Time: 4 hours ago
